Row.Text: Historic Moment
Your people celebrate a Historic Moment! {1_MomentDescription} (+{2_EraScoreAmount} Era Score)
Governor established in {1_CityName}
Governor {1_GovernorName} is now established in {2_CityName}
New Governor Opportunity Available
Appoint a new Governor or promote an existing Governor.
New Governor Title Available
Promote an existing [ICON_Governor] Governor, or Appoint a new Governor to your civilization.
Governor Title
Promote an existing Governor, or Appoint a new Governor to your civilization.
Governor Promotion
A Title is available to promote one of your Governors.
Governor Appointment
Appoint a new Governor to your civilization.
Keep or Free City
A foreign city has rebelled against its old owner, since its Loyalty dropped to 0. Your Loyalty is the strongest there, so it humbly requests to join your Civilization.
Governor Promotion Available
A promotion is available for one of your Governors.
Governor removed from {1_CityName}
Governor {1_GovernorName} is no longer assigned to {2_CityName}.
Governor {1_GovernorName} moved to {2_CityName}
Governor {1_GovernorName} has moved from {2_CityName} to {3_CityName}
Governor {1_GovernorName} has returned to service.
Governor {1_GovernorName} has returned to service. {2_GovernorTitle} can now be assigned to a city.
City Losing Loyalty
{1_CityName} is losing loyalty. If loyalty reaches 0, it could break away from our control. Assign a Governor to the city to stabilize it and gain the loyalty of the citizens there.
City Loyalty Lost
Because Loyalty dropped to 0, {1_CityName} has rebelled and become a Free City. To gain control of it again, you must once again exert your Loyalty there or use military force.
Because Loyalty dropped to 0, {1_CityName} has rebelled and joined {2_CivName}. To gain control of it again, you must once again exert your Loyalty there or use military force.
Foreign City Gains Independence
{1_CivName} no longer has enough Loyalty to keep the city of {2_CityName} in their empire. Nearby civilizations exerting Loyalty or using military force may soon gain control of this Free City.
Free City Petitions Civilization
The Free City of {2_CityName} succumbs to foreign pressure, and asks to join {1_CivName}.
Golden Age War
War of Retribution
Ideological War
Initiating a [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route has created a [ICON_TradingPost] Trading Post for you in the city of {1_CityName}.
Keep or Free City
A Free City has lost its desire to remain independent. Since your Loyalty is the strongest there, it humbly requests to join your Civilization.
Your agent {1_unitName} in {2_CityName} succeeded in removing enemy Envoys.
Success Fabricating Scandal
An enemy Spy in {1_CityName} succeeded in removing some of our Envoys.
Enemy Fabricated Scandal
Your agent {1_unitName} succeeded in reducing the owner's Loyalty in the city of {2_cityName}.
Success Fomenting Unrest
An enemy Spy has reduced the Loyalty of your citizens in {1_cityName}.
Enemy Fomented Unrest
Your agent {1_unitName} succeeded in neutralizing the enemy governor in the city of {2_cityName}, removing them from duty for {3_turns} turns.
Success Neutralizing Governor
An enemy Spy succeeded in neutralizing your governor {1_governorName} in the city of {2_cityName}, removing them from duty for {3_turns} turns.
Enemy Spy Neutralized Governor
Alliance Expired
Your Alliance with {1_CivName} has expired.
Alliance Level Increased
Your Alliance Level with {1_CivName} has increased.
Emergency Declared
{1_CivName} has been targeted by an Emergency.
An unknown player has been targeted by an Emergency.
Emergency Completed
The Emergency targeting you failed. You have been rewarded.
The Emergency targeting {1_CivName} failed. {1_CivName} has been rewarded.
The Emergency targeting an unknown player failed.
Emergency Completed
The Emergency targeting you succeeded. Those fighting against you have been rewarded.
The Emergency targeting {1_CivName} succeeded. Those fighting against {1_CivName} have been rewarded.
The Emergency targeting an unknown player succeeded.
Emergency Averted
The {1_EmergencyType} targeting {2_CivName} has ended because {3_CityName} has been destroyed.
The {1_EmergencyType} targeting {2_CivName} has ended because {3_CityName} has been returned to its original owner.
The {1_EmergencyType} targeting {2_CivName} has ended because {3_CityName} has been returned to its previous owner.
The {1_EmergencyType} targeting {2_CivName} has ended because {3_CityName} no longer belongs to {2_CivName}.
The {1_EmergencyType} targeting {2_CivName} has ended because {2_CivName} has been defeated.
EMERGENCY!
An Emergency needs your attention.
Pledge Fulfilled To You
The pledge made to you by the {1_CivName} to {2_PledgeType} has been fulfilled.
Your Pledge Fulfilled
Your pledge to the {1_CivName} to {2_PledgeType} has been fulfilled.
Pledge Broken To You
The pledge made to you by the {1_CivName} to {2_PledgeType} has been broken.
Your Pledge Broken
Your pledge to the {1_CivName} to {2_PledgeType} has been broken.
Make Dedication
Since the game has entered a new era, you are able to make a Dedication to guide your people towards the desired future for your civilization.
Dedication Bonus Triggered
{1_DedicationBonusTriggerSentence} Because of this, you receive Era Score from your Dedication bonus!
